user.description: The user associated with the repository.

namespace.description: The namespace associated with the repository.

is_private.description: Indicates whether the repository is private.

is_automated.description: Indicates whether the repository is automated.

can_edit.description: Indicates whether the user has edit permissions for the repository.

star_count.description: The count of stars or likes for the repository.

pull_count.description: The count of pulls or downloads for the repository.

date_registered.description: The date when the repository was registered on Docker Hub.

status_description.description: The description of the status of the repository.

content_types.description: The content types supported by the repository.

media_types.description: The media types supported by the repository.

last_updated.description: The date when the repository was last updated.

is_migrated.description: Indicates whether the repository has been migrated.

collaborator_count.description: The count of collaborators associated with the repository.

affiliation.description: The affiliation of the user or organization that owns the repository.

hub_user.description: The user associated with the repository on Docker Hub.
